name: Disturbing Lawnmower House
description:
An endless runner game of a girl who's running away from her father with an intent of butchering her. Having no clue of why did he want to do so, she just kept on running. However, it turns out that her "foster" father was already long dead, murdered by a man with the ability to turn into a werewolf whom then took his image. Game Controls- [Space Bar] - Jump over platforms/obstacles which will slow you down.

Game Jam Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/miniature-shaving-havoc
